sentences: Osad õpilased on juba kodutööd lõpetanud.
Osa mees oli tähelepanuväärne oma osavusega.
context: The Estonian word 'osad' is the plural form of the noun 'osa', meaning 'part'. In its plural form, it refers to multiple parts, shares, or portions. It can be used when discussing components of something, division of items, or allocation of resources among people.
